detaileddescription.para: As far as reset commands, there are 4 commands available:

para.ref: Reset the total events sent counter

listitem.para: Reset the events sent counter for a particular Application - e.g. reset the LC application events counter
Reset all of the event counters for a particular registered event for a particular Application - e.g. Reset event counter for Event ID 5 for the LC Application.
Reset all of the event counters for ALL registered events for a particular App - e.g. Reset all registered event counters for LC.

detaileddescription.para: Note that there is currently no way to reset ALL of the events sent counters for all of the Apps with one command.
